item.title: Back to the Basics - A Refresher on Basic Plot Types in R
item.description: Recently, I was working through a small analysis for a collaboration & I had to google how to make a box plot in R. I used to do more data viz than I do now. I was a bit bummed to have forgotten some basic plot types so quickly. I thought I would use this post as a quick refresher on some basic plot types in ggplot2. Let’s get started!
